sentences.sContent: Jim often helps out in that chain store after school.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jim often helps out in that chain store after school.
sentences.sCn: 吉姆经常在放学后在那家连锁店帮忙。

sentences.sContent: I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.
sentences.sContent_eng: I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.
sentences.sCn: 我在街道对面的连锁商店里买了这只面包。

sentences.sContent: I once stumbled into a chain store that sold only spices, but it was basic and simple—like ACME spices.
sentences.sContent_eng: I once stumbled into a chain store that sold only spices, but it was basic and simple—like ACME spices.
sentences.sCn: 一次我进到一个只卖调味料的连锁店，但是它卖的只是像ACME调味料那样基本和简单的。

trans.tranOther: one of a group of shops, all of which are owned by one organization
